about_the_game:
Huge and dangerous bugs are attacking you. Grow mutated plants that can shoot and defend themselves. Build Grow a reliable defense so that the bugs cannot break the core.

Gameplay

The gameplay loop of the game looks like this:

  • Plant

    Plant seeds in the soil so that crops can grow from them

  • Grow

    Take care of plants during the day and support the balance of nutrients in the ecosystem.

  • Mutate

    Select several plants and apply the secret growth formula on them.
    They will mutate into “towers” ​​and will be able to protect you and the entire base.

  • Defend

    At night you are attacked by bugs and your tower-plants fire at them.
    You too can join in the battle with your own pistol to save the situation, but be careful...

How long will you last?

Game Features

Customizable enemy path.

Bugs do not follow prepared paths.
Everyone has their own AI and they constantly analyze the situation and choose to move in a certain direction.
Ultimately, all bugs move towards the player or towards the core, but there are baits.
With their help, you can direct enemies in some direction or lure them into deadly zones.

Well-developed nutrient mechanics

Simply planting the seeds and waiting is not enough for growing good plants.
The game has a nutrient exchange system.
For example, potatoes secrete the nutrient "Potatium", which in large quantities slows down the growth of potatoes.
Thus, after some time, they will need to be moved to another soil or other vegetables planted in order to restore the nutrient balance.

Tower Defense + Farming

This game is a unique combination of Tower Defense and Farming genres.
During the day you tend to your garden.
Plant seeds, grow plants and care for them.
At night, bugs attack and the game turns into Tower Defense.
Mutated plants act as “towers” ​​and protect you from enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Grow gigantic mutated plants in an apocalyptic world. Every vegetable can stand up for itself and shoot custom projectiles. Place the plants wisely to defend yourself from different types of dangerous bugs.
